title: 一日皇帝，傻瓜统治着这残破的世界
contents:
Welcome To The Nightmare
欢迎来到噩梦
Where Villains Wear The Crowns
恶棍当道的地方
Fools Rule A Broken World
傻瓜统治着这残破的世界
And Fear Grows All Around
恐惧无处不在蔓延着
There's A Bad King
这里有个昏君
A Dreadful Puppet On A String
像被线操控的可怕人偶
He Pretends To Be A Champion
他在平民面前装作
Of The Common Man
最大赢家的姿态
Wants More Division In His Lost And Riven Land
期望更多群众到他分裂的国土（湾湾回家）
He Plays With Real Lives
他假装这个是现实
In The Darkest Game Of Life
最黑暗的游戏中
His Greedy Eyes
他贪婪的目光
Look Insane
看起来疯狂
Frozen Smile Like He's In Pain
无情的微笑如同他也在苦痛
He Doesn't Count The Human Cost
从不计算人权的成本（不惜一切代价）
But Only Money Made Or Lost
一心只为获取更多的金钱
King For A Day
做一天的皇帝
He Kills The Truth And Looks Away
他转移矛盾扼杀真相
King For A Day
做一天的皇帝
Lives Like The World Would End Today
今天就是世界末日
King For A Day
做一天的皇帝
What Do You Hide?
你在隐藏什么？
Why Do You Lie?
你为何满嘴谎言？
Who Made The Rules For This Game?
是谁定下这里的规则？
Who Is Paying Your Champagne?
你的疯狂谁来买单？
All The Mercy In The World
全世界的慈悲
Cannot Save You Anymore
都拯救不了你
King For A Day
做一天的皇帝
He Knows How To Justify
他善于狡辩
And How To Feed The Myths
知道如何编造神话
How To Glorify The Lies
也知道如何去美化谎言
And Hide The Truth
掩盖真相
He Talks A Lot But
他说了很多承诺
His Mouth Is Full Of Empty Words
但都是无意义的空话
He Has The Right Friends Making Shady Inside Deals
他和权贵做着肮脏的内幕交易
Before The Story Ends We Will Be Out Of Tears
在结束前我们眼泪早已流尽
Fools Give The Answers
傻瓜给出了答案
Wise Men Don't Even Try
聪明人别去尝试
The Time Has Come，To Dethrone Him
时间到了，要登基
But There's A New Clone Stepping In
但坐上王位的人还是同样昏庸
Just More Scum
只是更渣了
Another Greedy, Rotten Puppet On A String
又是一个贪婪，丑恶的人偶
King For A Day
做一天的皇帝
He Kills The Truth And Looks Away
他转移矛盾扼杀真相
King For A Day
做一天的皇帝
Lives Like The World Would End Today
今天就是世界末日
King For A Day
做一天的皇帝
What Do You Hide?
你在隐藏什么？
Why Do You Lie?
你为何满嘴谎言？
Who Made The Rules For This Game?
是谁定下这里的规则？
Who Is Paying Your Champagne?
你的疯狂谁来买单？
All The Mercy In The World
全世界的慈悲
Cannot Save You Anymore
都拯救不了你
King For A Day
做一天的皇帝
Solo

I Own The Seas
我拥有着大海
I Have The Earth On Its Knees
这片土地会向我下跪
Give Me Another Day
再多给我一天
And I'll Take Your Future Away
我会夺走你的未来
Just Vote For Me Again
再次给我支持
King For A Day
做一天的皇帝
He Kills The Truth And Looks Away
他转移矛盾扼杀真相

做一天的皇帝
